title: Contextual Artifacts Principle
description: Rules for ensuring maximum context preservation during session handoffs and legislative growth.

values.name: Context Maximization
values.rule: Leave as many context artifacts as possible (e.g., comments, MCP headers, documentation).
values.rationale: High-fidelity context is the 'oxygen' of the swarm, enabling seamless session handoffs and maintaining the firm's cognitive continuity across generations of agents.
